00077 #include <ctype.h>
00078 #include <errno.h>
00079 #include <limits.h>
00080 #include <stdlib.h>
00081 
00086 
00098 unsigned long strtoul(CONST char *nptr, char **endptr, int base)
00099 {
00100     register CONST char *s;
00101     register unsigned long acc, cutoff;
00102     register int c;
00103     register int neg, any, cutlim;
00104 
00105     /*
00106      * See strtol for comments as to the logic used.
00107      */
00108     s = nptr;
00109     do {
00110         c = (unsigned char) *s++;
00111     } while (isspace(c));
00112     if (c == '-') {
00113         neg = 1;
00114         c = *s++;
00115     } else {
00116         neg = 0;
00117         if (c == '+')
00118             c = *s++;
00119     }
00120     if ((base == 0 || base == 16) && c == '0' && (*s == 'x' || *s == 'X')) {
00121         c = s[1];
00122         s += 2;
00123         base = 16;
00124     }
00125     if (base == 0)
00126         base = c == '0' ? 8 : 10;
00127 
00128     cutoff = ULONG_MAX / (unsigned long) base;
00129     cutlim = ULONG_MAX % (unsigned long) base;
00130     for (acc = 0, any = 0;; c = (unsigned char) *s++) {
00131         if (isdigit(c))
00132             c -= '0';
00133         else if (isalpha(c))
00134             c -= isupper(c) ? 'A' - 10 : 'a' - 10;
00135         else
00136             break;
00137         if (c >= base)
00138             break;
00139         if (any < 0)
00140             continue;
00141         if ((acc > cutoff || acc == cutoff) && c > cutlim) {
00142             any = -1;
00143             acc = ULONG_MAX;
00144             errno = ERANGE;
00145         } else {
00146             any = 1;
00147             acc *= (unsigned long) base;
00148             acc += c;
00149         }
00150     }
00151     if (neg && any > 0)
00152         acc = -acc;
00153     if (endptr != 0)
00154         *endptr = (char *) (any ? s - 1 : nptr);
00155     return (acc);
00156 }
